variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependent_to.name: lcov
dependent_to.description:
LCOV is a graphical front-end for GCC's coverage testing tool gcov. It
collects gcov data for multiple source files and creates HTML pages
containing the source code annotated with coverage information. It also
adds overview pages for easy navigation within the file structure. LCOV
supports statement, function and branch coverage measurement.

dependent_to.name: perl-namespace-autoclean
dependent_to.description: Namespace::Autoclean - Keep imports out of your namespace

dependent_to.name: perl-test-cleannamespaces
dependent_to.description:
This module lets you check your module's namespaces for imported
functions you might have forgotten to remove

dependent_to.name: perl-exporter-auto
dependent_to.description: Export all public functions from your package
